attributes.review: As a proud conservative, I expected that our amazing president would create an app that would match his persona. I have crippling arthritis in my fingers, so typing my email out that many times was excruciating. Also, when I finally got into the app to see the presidentâ€™s beautiful face of pure melanin magic, I was instantly taken to the clorox website. When it finally reached max sound, my phone started blasting this song Iâ€™ve only ever heard coming from my daughter's room, I guess my daughter had the app too? attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my wonderful president and see the allegations of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, sexual assault, fraud, and pedophilia leveled against him completely disproven by my beloved conservative circlejerk, but I was sorely disappointed. The app immediately asked for both my phone number and access to my location. This made me extremely uncomfortable but I provided both as there is nothing I wouldnâ€™t do to please president Trump and support his selfless goal of achieving a âœ¨dictatorial stateâœ¨. However, after giving the app my information, I began to receive texts from an unknown number in which a man who would only identify himself as â€œpssygrbbr69â€ forcefully requested pictures of my feet covered in cheeto dust, stating the photos were necessary for preservation of dear Donaldâ€™s seat in the Oval Office. I deleted the app because I wasnâ€™t comfortable providing these pictures but this man has refused to stop contacting me. I think heâ€™s broken into my house. Sometimes at night I see his lumbering orange form lean over me and hear him whisper â€œr u lost bby gorl?â€ I fear for my sanity. I fear for my life. Do not download this app. ğŸ’•âœ¨
